attributes.action: Change the law to make it obligatory for ANYBODY paid using taxpayer pounds to place their employment income and tax records in the public domain.
attributes.additional_details: Far too many people living off taxpayer pounds are being encouraged by our corrupt political elite to avoid contributing to the running costs of the country.  The money being paid over to these people is PUBLIC money, taken under threat of criminalisation (unless you happen to be on pal terms with corrupt politicians and can get HMRC to ignore your tax avoidance set up) and therefore the people who are paying it over have a Human Right to be provided with the information over where their money is being used and abused.
